content:
That's great to hear! I'm excited for you to try out the Butter Chicken recipe and I'm confident that it will turn out delicious. Remember, the key is to take your time and be patient while cooking, especially when simmering the sauce. And don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions or need any clarification on any of the steps.

It was my pleasure to help and guide you through this process. I hope you have a great time cooking and enjoying the dish with your family and friends. And don't forget to share your experience and any variations you make to the recipe with me!

Good luck and happy cooking!
